name: cosmetologist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a trained person whose job is to improve the appearance of a customer's face, hair, or skin using make-up and beauty treatments: The cosmetologist told her about a new product for rejuvenating the skin. His wife works full-time as a cosmetologist. Synonym
beautician
